name: The Nettle and Farmstay
description: The Nettle and Fern Farmstay features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Pelling. There is free private parking and the property provides paid airport shuttle service.

name: Jo'stel Dream Glory Hotel and Bar
description: Located in Gangtok, 2.6 miles from Namgyal Institute of Tibetology, Jo'stel Dream Glory Hotel and Bar - Near MG Marg provides accommodations with a garden, free private parking.

name: The Staynest retreat and SPA
description: Located in Gangtok, 1.4 miles from Palzor Stadium, The Staynest retreat and SPA Gangtok 4 STAR LUXURY RESORT has accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness center.

name: Summit Tashi Ghang Heritage Resort
description: Summit Tashi Ghang Heritage Resort has a garden, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Pelling. Featuring room service, this property also provides guests with a playground.

name: Tempo Heritage Resort & Spa
description: Located in Gangtok, a 10-minute walk from Enchey Monastery, Tempo Heritage Resort & Spa provides accommodations with a fitness center, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant.

name: Sakura Garden Retreat
description: Sakura Garden Retreat, Ravangla has a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Ravangla. This 3-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi.
